{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.11950v1", "title": "Fractional powers of the backward heat operator and Carleman type
  inequalities", "summary": "In this paper we derive the fractional power of the backward heat operator as
a high dimensional limit of the fractional Laplacian. As applications, we
derive Carleman type inequalities for fractional powers of the backward heat
operator.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-16T10:26:11Z"}
